title: All About Olaf
description: An unofficial mobile app for St. Olaf College.
longDescription: This iOS and Android app provides valuable information to students, faculty, staff, and visitors of St. Olaf College.
detailList: Access balances and meal plan info
View building open and close schedules
Access the campus directory and important contacts
Tune-in to streaming events and radio programs
See the campus at a birds-eye view with the map
Define campus terms with the dictionary

title: Class Dumper
description: Examine Objective-C runtime information stored in Mach-O files.
detailList: Invoke class-dump 3.5 (64 bit) from the file picker
Save results to a local sqlite database with GRDB
Manage previous dumps from a finder-like interface

title: CCC Server
description: A node server to power All About Olaf.
detailList: Data fetching for Google Calendar, RSS, Wordpress, ReasonCMS, Github Pages, Bon Appetit, and Presence.io

title: CCC Server Next
description: The next version of CCC-Server, written in Rust.
detailList: Crates for fetching, parsing, and serving data
Data fetching for Wordpress, GitHub pages, and Bon Appetit

title: Bottomless
description: An unofficial mobile app for Bottomless subscribers.
longDescription: This iOS and iPadOS app provides Bottomless coffee users a native experience for managing their account.
detailList: Listing your orders (up next, in-progress, past)
Graphing the scale’s weight and showing the scale’s status
Preferences for changing your ordering strategy
